ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>var host = getHost(); 
var bookId = java.get('book_id'); 
var sourceVal = java.get('source'); 
var itemId = java.getString('$.item_id'); 
host + '/content?book_id=' + bookId + '&item_id=' + itemId + '&source=' + encodeURIComponent(sourceVal);</js>
